features: 【 Compatible Models 】Compatible with Shark Steam Mop Replacement Pads. Compatible with Shark S7000 Series Steam Hard Floor Pads, for model XKITP7000, S7201WBKT, S7000, S7000AMZ, S7001, S7001TGT, S7201 S7005 S7020 Steam Mop pad, Steam & Scrub All-in-One Scrubbing.

【 Wide Usage on Various Floor Types 】Suitable For All Hard Floors, like wooden floors, ceramic tile, marble floors, laminate floors, short wool carpets, and other places where hygiene is essential. Removing tough stains while keeping floors protected.

【 Value Package 】10 pack 7000amz mop pads, cheap enough so you can simply remove and replace each dirty pad, which can help you save money. We suggest replacing the mop pad about every 1-2 months to maintain cleaning performance.

【 Reusable & Easy Installation 】Our replacement mop pad is made of premium microfiber, can be washable and reusable multiple times, is effective cleaning, super-absorbent, and delivers an amazing clean with fast dry time, without fading in high temperatures, is easy to install with no extra tools needed, and easy to use in daily life.

【 Premium Quality Performance 】Mesh lining in the mop back, when it works allows steam to flow outward easily. Premium microfiber makes it easily cleans stains and hair remaining on the floor. Super friction can break up stubborn sticky stains easily in the kitchen, balcony or entryway.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Regular Scrub Pad Made of 75% high-quality microfiber and 25% nylon yarn. Strong water absorption, durable and wear-resistant. Can easily remove dirt, dust, and all kinds of hard floor scrubbing. Ideal for absorbing water-based stains, and cleaning bathrooms and laundry rooms. Twist Cloth Pad Its use of thickened encrypted fleece fabric and closely interwoven. The Gray Soft Touch Mop Pad makes the mop pad more absorbent. Can attract dust and dirt effectively. Suitable for lighter stains, dry mopping and use on floors with water. Heavy Scrub Pad The Corrugated Heavy Scrub Pad is made of per-absorbent fabric. Strong water absorption can clean up something sticky and hard-to-remove stains on the floor, making it easier to achieve a quick clean. Perfect for bathrooms and laundry rooms. Powerful Scrub Pad Made of orange velvet and high-hardness nylon yarn. The super rubbing power can easily tackle stubborn sticky and hard-to-remove stains. Perfect for cleaning kitchens, balconies, entryways, and any sealed hard-floor living area.
